name: 3daxialize
author: AFNI Team
description: Read and write dataset as new dataset with data brick oriented as axial slices.

inputs.description: Use specified prefix for the new dataset. Default is 'axialize'.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Write dataset in sagittal slice order.
inputs.name: Sagittal slice order flag

inputs.description: Write dataset in coronal slice order.
inputs.name: Coronal slice order flag

inputs.description: Write dataset in axial slice order, the default orientation.
inputs.name: Axial slice order flag

inputs.description: Orientation code for output. 3 letters: one from {R,L}, {A,P}, {I,S}.
inputs.name: Orientation code

inputs.description: Write data as it is rotated, saving memory. Not available with NIFTI datasets.
inputs.name: Frugal flag

output-files.description: Output dataset with axial slices orientation
output-files.name: Output dataset file
